metadata.title: CVE-2018-19211 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In ncurses 6.1, there is a NULL pointer dereference at function _nc_parse_entry in parse_entry.c that will lead to a denial of service attack. The product proceeds to the dereference code path even after a "dubious character `*' in name or alias field" detection.

notes.note: sbeattie> noted elsewhere that this is the same issue as CVE-2018-10754

criterions.comment: ncurses package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.1+20180210-4ubuntu1').
